overview:
Brooke Partelow has a long and successful history working as a Sales Executive with several significant online businesses and marketing agencies. She currently serves as VP of Sales and Client Services at SteelHouse, a digital display advertising platform for eCommerce marketers.

Brooke built a strong foundation in sales and client services during the four years she spent at SkillSoft, formerly known as KnowledgeNet. She then formed a dynamic understanding of digital marketing as Director of Sales at Amadesa, a web site optimization platform. Most recently, Brooke worked at Fetchback as Senior Retargeting Strategist.
